paper.title: Volatility estimation with a neural network
paper.abstract: The prediction of the volatility of financial time-series is very important for the evaluation and pricing of options and the development of option trading strategies. In this paper, a neural network for predicting the volatility of the German Bund future is presented. Its performance is compared to that of a nonlinear GARCH model.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用神经网络预测金融时间序列的波动率，并明确指出其应用场景包括期权的评估和定价，这直接关联到衍生品定价领域。
